ja492:2.3: girīnajjo → giri nadiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); girinajjo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja492:4.1: Aññampi → aññaṁ hi (bj, pts-vp-pli1); aññañhi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja492:9.3: migavadhāya → miga viriyaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); migaviriya (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja492:14.4: byagghe → vyagghe ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1); byaggho na (sya1ed, sya2ed)
